title: How to Survive Job Loss During a Pandemic
author: Chinju Kunjumon
desc: It feels strangely dystopian but it could be a reality that the lion's share of the country's populance hasn't ventured out their houses for nearly a month presently.
para: Mister Trouble never hangs around when he hears this Mighty sound: 'Here I come to save the day!' That means that Mighty Mouse is on his way. Yes sir, when there is a wrong to right Mighty Mouse will join the fight. On the sea or on the land, he gets the situation well in hand! I bet we been together for a million years, And I bet we'll be together for a million more. Oh, It's like I started breathing on the night we kissed, and I can't remember what I ever did before. What would we do baby, without us? What would we do baby, without us? And there ain't no nothing we can't love each other through. What would we do baby, without us? Sha la la la. Wally Gator is a swinging alligator in the swamp. He's the greatest percolator when he really starts to romp. There has never been a greater operator in the swamp. See ya later, Wally Gator.
